input.sentences: we were very happy with the large crowd that turned out for the charity ceremony .
the first speaker talked about the importance this charity has in the community .
the second speaker gave her testimony about how the charity changed her life .
the checks were then presented and everyone found out the grand total of the giving that year .
out family was so happy that we are part of this wonderful organization .
output.sentences: An audience gathered to listen to people speak.
A man started the ceremony and gave a wonderful speech.
A young woman followed and everyone enjoyed what she said.
Presenters gave checks to those who participated.
My family had a great time and even got our picture taken.
